bom.spec: 1.5 mm thick, laser-cut to channel pattern
3 mm dia, 15 mm length, hardened steel
0.5 mm dia, 150 mm length, PTFE sheath
3 mm OD, 2 mm ID, 600.0 mm length × 17

fabrication.name: Preparation
steps: Clean all glass plates in piranha solution (3:1 H2SO4:H2O2) for 30 min
Rinse 5× with DI water, dry under N2 flow
Verify plate dimensions: 200×550.0×10 mm (tolerance ±0.1 mm)
Prepare TiO2 coating suspension: 5 wt% P25 in ethanol + 1% Ti-isopropoxide
Sonicate suspension for 30 min, filter through 5 μm mesh

fabrication.name: Channel Machining
steps: CNC mill 16 parallel channels in bottom glass plate
Channel dimensions: 2.0×0.5×500 mm (tolerance ±0.05 mm)
Channel pitch: 4.0 mm center-to-center
Inlet manifold cavity: 10×64×0.5 mm
Outlet manifold cavity: matching inlet
Deburr all channel edges with 800-grit SiC paper
Ultrasonic clean machined plate in acetone (15 min) then DI water (15 min)
Verify channel depth with profilometer (±0.02 mm required)

fabrication.name: Electrode Integration
steps: Cut 16 HV electrode strips: 0.1×2×500 mm copper foil
Cut 16 ground electrode strips: matching dimensions
Position HV electrodes on bottom plate between channels (adhesive-backed)
Position ground electrodes on top plate, aligned with HV electrodes
Verify electrode-to-channel alignment: ±0.2 mm tolerance
Solder HV bus bar connecting all HV electrodes in parallel
Solder ground bus bar connecting all ground electrodes in parallel
Resistance check: <0.5 Ω from connector to each electrode tip

fabrication.name: Dielectric & Catalyst Coating
steps: Mask channel bottoms (liquid zone) with Kapton tape
Dip-coat electrode surfaces with TiO2 suspension (3 layers)
Between layers: dry at 60°C for 30 min
Remove Kapton mask from channel bottoms
Apply thin TiO2 layer to gas gap surfaces (1 layer, thinner)
Final cure: ramp to 200°C at 2°C/min, hold 2h, cool naturally
Target coating: 2 mg/cm² TiO2, 0.5 mm thickness, 60% porosity
Verify coating adhesion: Scotch tape test (must pass)

fabrication.name: Manifold Assembly
steps: Install PEEK 1-to-16 inlet manifold with Swagelok fittings
Install PEEK 16-to-1 outlet manifold
Connect PTFE tubing (1/16" OD) to inlet and outlet
Install check valves at inlet (prevent backflow)
Attach thermocouple ports at inlet, outlet, mid-length (×2)
Attach pressure tap at inlet (before manifold)

fabrication.name: Cooling System
steps: Route copper serpentine between channels on bottom plate
Apply thermal paste to serpentine-plate contact surfaces
Connect serpentine inlet/outlet to recirculating chiller
Verify serpentine flow: >100 mL/min with <0.5 bar pressure drop
Thermal test: run chiller at 15°C, verify plate reaches 18°C in <5 min

fabrication.name: Sealing & Leak Test
steps: Place PTFE gaskets on both sides of channel plate
Assemble top plate, align with pins, torque bolts to 2 N·m in star pattern
Pressurize with N2 to 50 kPa, hold 10 min, verify zero pressure drop
Fill with DI water at 5 mL/min, check all fittings for leaks
Increase flow to 20 mL/min, verify no leaks at operating pressure
Dye test: inject 0.1% Rhodamine B, verify uniform exit from all channels

fabrication.name: Electrical Commissioning
steps: Connect HV supply to electrode bus bars via HV cable
Connect HV probe and current transformer to oscilloscope
Dielectric test: ramp voltage 0→5 kV at 20 kHz, verify no arcing
Ramp to 8 kV: verify uniform plasma glow through glass (visual)
Ramp to 12 kV at 30 kHz: record V, I waveforms
Calculate power: P = (1/T)∫V(t)·I(t)dt over 10 cycles
Verify power within 10% of predicted 86.4 W
Run 1 hour with water flow: verify stable operation, no arcing

measurement_equipment.model_example: Type K, 0.5 mm dia, PTFE sheath
measurement_equipment.measurement: Reactor temperature at 4 points (inlet, mid×2, outlet)

measurement_equipment.model_example: Sensirion SLF3x or thermal mass flow

measurement_equipment.calibration: Known AC source at 1 kV, 10 kV

measurement_equipment.measurement: V(t), I(t) waveforms for power calculation

experimental_phases.name: Commissioning
experimental_phases.objective: Verify reactor integrity, flow distribution, plasma ignition

steps.detail: Pressurize with N2 to 50 kPa. Hold 10 min. Accept: zero pressure drop.
Set pump to 15 mL/min. Measure outlet with graduated cylinder over 5 min.
Inject Rhodamine B dye pulse at inlet. Photograph outlet channels simultaneously.
steps.pass_criteria: All 16 channels show dye within 2 s of each other

steps.detail: Ramp voltage: 0→5→8→10→12 kV at 30 kHz (2 min per step). Monitor for arcing.
steps.pass_criteria: Uniform glow in all channels at 12 kV, no visible arcs

steps.detail: Run plasma at 12 kV, 30 kHz with water at 15 mL/min for 30 min. Record T at all 4 points.
Verify chiller maintains coolant at 15±1°C, flow >100 mL/min.

experimental_phases.name: Baseline Characterization
experimental_phases.objective: Validate CFD predictions (RTD, pressure, thermal, OES)

steps.detail: Inject 0.1 mL Rhodamine B pulse at inlet. Record outlet fluorescence vs time (spectrometer, 10 Hz).
Measure ΔP at 5, 10, 15, 20 mL/min (3 replicates each). Plot ΔP vs Q.
Record temperatures at 4 points under plasma (12 kV, 30 kHz, 15 mL/min). Steady state = 30 min.
Record optical emission spectrum (300-400 nm) through glass window. Identify OH(A-X) at 309 nm.
steps.pass_criteria: OH(A-X) 309 nm band present, intensity scales with voltage

steps.detail: Record V(t) and I(t) waveforms at 12 kV, 30 kHz. Compute P = ∫V·I dt / T over 100 cycles.
Test 3 voltages (10, 12, 14 kV) × 3 frequencies (20, 25, 30 kHz). Record P, T, OES for each.

experimental_phases.name: CQD Synthesis & Validation
experimental_phases.objective: Produce CQDs, measure properties, compare to digital twin

steps.detail: Dilute manure slurry to 2 g/L with DI water. Filter through 100 μm mesh. Sonicate 15 min.
steps.pass_criteria: Homogeneous suspension, no visible solids >100 μm

steps.detail: Run at nominal conditions (12 kV, 30 kHz, 15 mL/min) for 2 h each. Collect product in amber vials.
steps.pass_criteria: Visible fluorescence under 365 nm UV lamp

steps.detail: Excite product at 365 nm. Record emission 400-700 nm. Extract peak λ, FWHM, intensity.
Drop-cast on Cu grid. Image 200+ particles. Measure size distribution.
Hydrodynamic size in DI water. 3 measurements × 15 runs each.
Gravimetric: filter 100 mL product through 0.22 μm, dry at 60°C, weigh. Verify with UV-Vis calibration curve.
Test 10, 15, 20 mL/min at fixed 12 kV, 30 kHz. Measure production rate and λ at each.
steps.pass_criteria: Production peaks near 15 mL/min, λ shifts <20 nm across range

steps.detail: Connect classifier controller. Run 1 h. Record valve actions vs PL readings.

sample_size.justification: Minimum for t-distribution CI; limited by precursor and reactor time

tests.name: One-sample t-test (predicted vs measured)
tests.purpose: Test if measured mean matches digital twin prediction
tests.interpretation: Reject H0 → model prediction outside experimental range

tests.name: Bland-Altman analysis
tests.purpose: Assess agreement between model and experiment
tests.method: Plot (model+experiment)/2 vs (model-experiment). Calculate limits of agreement.

tests.name: Power analysis
tests.purpose: Verify n=3 is sufficient to detect meaningful differences
tests.result: n=3 sufficient for large effects (d>1.5); n=6 needed for medium (d~0.8)

data_processing: Remove first 10 min of each run (transient startup)
Outlier removal: Grubbs test (α=0.05) on triplicates
